synopsis.text: Ooal Gown's expansionist strategies, Tanya Degurechaff's military exploits, Kazuma Satou's misadventures, and the demonic sisterhood of Rem and Ram - these iconic characters from their respective isekai worlds are thrust into a new and unfamiliar realm. A mysterious red button, too enticing not to be pressed, transports them to this strange place. With no escape in sight, they find themselves in a mundane yet challenging environment: a classroom. Forced to adapt to a normal school life, these eccentric personalities collide, creating an unpredictable and entertaining mix. Witness the chaos unfold as these fan-favorite characters navigate their new reality in "Isekai Quartet".
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
